subject: Simsonn Plus X Inquiry
description_text:
To whom it may concern,

Good day!

I am Nikko and I am interested with the Simsonn Pro X pedals. 

I would like to ask whatâ€™s the maximum measure in kg does the loadcell offers? I cannot find it in the infographic present on the website.

Thank you!

Sincerely,
Nikko

conversations.body_text: Hi Nikko Villatura,    The maximum force is 200 kg.
